title.rendered: Traditional Sausage and Lentil Chilli Hotpot

content.rendered:
Recipe developed by our friends at Wonderbag. A hearty, rich, savoury dish, with the richness of Fry’s Traditional Sausages. Great for a winter lunch or dinner!

Ingredients

Ingredients
8 Fry’s Traditional Sausages
30 ml cooking oil
1 ½ onions, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 red bell pepper, chopped
3 chillies, chopped
2 tins of 400g tins lentils, drained
300 ml tomato paste
45 ml brown sugar
15 ml salt
15 ml coarse black pepper
45 ml chopped coriander

Directions

Heat the oil in a medium sized pot and fry the Fry’s Traditional Sausages until browned. Remove and set aside a bowl.

Place the onion, garlic and red pepper in the same pot and fry until lightly browned. Add all the remaining ingredients and the sausages, bring the pot to the boil with the lid on for 7 Minutes

Place tea towel inside your Wonderbag. Then take your hot pot from the stove and place into your Wonderbag. Place the Wonderbag lid on top of the pot and pull the toggle to tightly seal and leave to cook for 120 Minutes

Serve with crusty bread, pap, rice or delicious savoury mash.
